channel.title: WhatsMac
channel.description: A native Mac app wrapper for WhatsApp Web

item.title: Version 1.2.0
item.description:
NOTE: This update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually by clicking "Learn More"

Changes

  • WhatsMac is now named ChitChat
  • Fix for no-images bug caused by recent WhatsApp Web changes
  • Various graphical fixes
  • Additional keyboard shortcuts (see README)
  • The app is now signed with a developer certificate so is allowed by GateKeeper

item.title: Version 1.3.0
item.description:
NOTE: If you are still running a version of ChitChat released as WhatsMac then his update cannot be applied automatically and must be downloaded manually from release page.

Changes

  • Fix for "Safari Version" bug introduced Aug 2015
  • Usability Fixes
  • Various graphical fixes
  • Now supports iOS devices without jailbreak!
